item.title: ::Jail command [Pi]
item.dc:creator: @smokerboy239 smokerboy239
item.description:
@smokerboy239 wrote:

Hey guys, my jail is based around scaperune. But you can still teleport out.

In playerassistant.java:

if(c.isInJail()) { c.sendMessage("You cannot teleport out of jail, please wait for assistance."); return; }

in player.java:

public boolean isInJail() { if(absX >= 2110 && absX <= 2077 && absY >= 4418 && absY <= 4440) { return true; } return false; }

Is this right?

Edit: Also, I have added it correctly to commands.java but I want to know how to make it everyone see’s your actions. So it says something like:
[Jail]Nathan has Jailed “”.
So then people can ask the reason.

Read full topic
